function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of common opinion on variables for calculating the soundness of banks","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the soundness of banks, leading to misallocation of credit guarantees","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research to identify key variables for assessing the soundness of banks","Technologies":"Advanced data analytics, machine learning algorithms","People":"Banking experts, financial analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Direct impact of banks' financial performance on their soundness","Impact":"Unstable financial performance affecting the soundness of banks and their creditworthiness","Mitigation":"Implement robust risk management practices and financial monitoring systems","Technologies":"Financial analytics software, risk assessment models","People":"Banking institutions, risk management professionals","Owner":"Banking institutions, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Use of statistical techniques for categorizing banks based on creditworthiness","Impact":"Misclassification of banks' creditworthiness, leading to incorrect determination of credit guarantee ratios","Mitigation":"Validate the effectiveness of statistical techniques through comparative analysis and expert review","Technologies":"Statistical modeling software, expert review platforms","People":"Statisticians, banking experts, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory authorities"}]}
